scripts.start: concurrently "cd app && npm start" "cross-env BROWSER=none NODE_ENV=development electron-forge start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd app && npm start" "cross-env BROWSER=none NODE_ENV=development electron-forge start"
scripts.start-prod: cd app && npm run build && cd .. && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge start
scripts.build: cd app && npm run build && cd .. && electron-forge package
scripts.make: cd app && npm run build && cd .. && electron-forge make
scripts.package: cd app && npm run build && cd .. && electron-forge package
